item.description:
Come Join Us for a Potluck Dinner 6:30 PM, bring a prepared dish and serving utensils and recipe (important for people's allergies) Raw, organic, vegan (no animal products, eggs, or dairy). See recipes at www.optimumhealthsolution.org or call Betsy for ideas at 781-899-6664.

 

7:30 PM FREE screening of "Bethany's Story" An Inspirational Documentary About the Power of Raw Foods When Janet McKee met a girl who had been suffering from a mystery ailment that baffled doctors get out of her wheelchair after drastically changing her diet, she knew that the story had to be documented for others to learn from. The resulting documentary chronicles Bethany's moving journey from illness to recovery. While the story is unique unto itself, it's not the first time McKee has seen people recover in ways that can only be termed "miraculous", and she's convinced that diet was the one variable that measurably resulted in those recoveries.

Friday, February 22nd 6:30pm -9:00pm @ Waltham Chiropractic 136 Bacon Street, Waltham (Handdicap access and plenty of parking) FREE thanks to generous donor.


"Very Inspiring. What I liked most about the film was that it was a real family's story of how change can make a miraculous difference." For more information about Bethany's Story click . Featuring Interviews from 6 internationally recognized health experts. For further inquiry, contact Betsy Bragg at: betsy.bragg6@gmail.com

Buy your own "Bethany's Story" DVD at the event for only $21!
item.name: Come Join Us For a Potluck dinner and FREE Screening of "Bethany's Story"
